message.raw:
* segway/observations.py (find_overlaps_exclude): fix bugs introduced
by refactoring, restoring from run.py r7572
(Observations.skip_or_split_window): add docstring
(Observations.locate_windows): refactor to eliminate duplication, by
calling process_new_windows()

* test/clean.sh: only clean to maxdepth 2

message.raw:
* test/simplereverse/include-coords.bed: make identical to simpleconcat

load_viterbi_save_bed, load_posterior_save_bed,
parse_viterbi_save_bed): add do_reverse
(parse_viterbi): add do_reverse; add sentinel value for unassigned segments
(task, main): add reverse

* segway/_util.py: remove unused imports

* test: update lots of touchstones

message.raw:
* segway/cluster/sge_setup.py:
(sge_setup): use Python 2.6 NamedTemporaryFile(delete=False)

* segway/run.py: change window_coords to use Window
(Results): new namedtuple subclass replaces tuple
(Runner.run_train_multithread): use itertools.product(), fix
	"include_cords" typo

* segway/output.py, segway/observations.py: change window_coords to use Window

* segway/layer.py (layer): remove comment

* segway/_util.py (NamedTemporaryDir): remove
(_Window): new name for Window
(Window): new class to allow __len__

* NEWS: update

summary.html:
• segway/cluster/sge_setup.py:
    (sge_setup): use Python 2.6 NamedTemporaryFile(delete=False)

  • segway/run.py: change window_coords to use Window
    (Results): new namedtuple subclass replaces tuple
    (Runner.run_train_multithread): use itertools.product(), fix

values.message:
* segway/cluster/sge_setup.py:
(sge_setup): use Python 2.6 NamedTemporaryFile(delete=False)

* segway/run.py: change window_coords to use Window
(Results): new namedtuple subclass replaces tuple
(Runner.run_train_multithread): use itertools.product(), fix
	"include_cords" typo

* segway/output.py, segway/observations.py: change window_coords to use Window

* segway/layer.py (layer): remove comment

* segway/_util.py (NamedTemporaryDir): remove
(_Window): new name for Window
(Window): new class to allow __len__

* NEWS: update

message.raw:
* run.py:
(set_option): fix for use with track_specs in train.tab
(bed_filename): add support for multiple worlds in identify
(num_tracks): return len(self.head_trackname_list) so that it works
with multiple worlds
(Runner.run_identify_posterior): multiple world support
(Runner.run) [self.posterior and self.num_worlds != 1]: NotImplementedError

* task.py (replace_args_filelistname): fix prefix, suffix order of
temporary filelists
(run_posterior_save_bed, run_viterbi_save_bed): style

* output.py (make_filename): new function
(IdentifySaver.concatenate, IdentifySaver.__call__, PosteriorSaver.__call__): multiple world support

• run.py:
    (set_option): fix for use with track_specs in train.tab
    (bed_filename): add support for multiple worlds in identify
    (num_tracks): return len(self.head_trackname_list) so that it works
    with multiple worlds
    (Runner.run_identify_posterior): multiple world support
    (Runner.run) [self.posterior and self.num_worlds != 1]: NotImplementedError

  • task.py (replace_args_filelistname): fix prefix, suffix order of
    temporary filelists
    (run_posterior_save_bed, run_viterbi_save_bed): style

  • output.py (make_filename): new function
    (IdentifySaver.concatenate, IdentifySaver.call, PosteriorSaver.call): multiple world support

values.message:
* run.py:
(set_option): fix for use with track_specs in train.tab
(bed_filename): add support for multiple worlds in identify
(num_tracks): return len(self.head_trackname_list) so that it works
with multiple worlds
(Runner.run_identify_posterior): multiple world support
(Runner.run) [self.posterior and self.num_worlds != 1]: NotImplementedError

* task.py (replace_args_filelistname): fix prefix, suffix order of
temporary filelists
(run_posterior_save_bed, run_viterbi_save_bed): style

* output.py (make_filename): new function
(IdentifySaver.concatenate, IdentifySaver.__call__, PosteriorSaver.__call__): multiple world support

message.raw:
segway.observations.Observations.make_seq_cells(): allow multiple
worlds

segway.run.Runner.fromoptions(): add comments

segway.run.Runner.world_tracknames(), world_track_indexes(), num_worlds():
new memoized_properties

segway.run.Runner.set_tracknames(): set self.tied_tracknames in case
where no tracknames specified

segway.run.Runner.queue_gmtk(): remove PYTHONINSPECT from environment
when necessary

message.raw:
setup.py: now requires Genomedata 1.3.2

segway.observations: observations code from segway._util and
	segway.observations
change observations, task to use Genomedata 1.3.2 list of track_indexes
	subsetting
segway.run.Runner: * add uuid, num_worlds
* num_windows() now a memoized_property
* refactoring of save_obserations_params() to use
	segway.observations.Observations

test/test.sh: remove tied stuff (will go into a separate test script)

message.raw:
* now requires a new version of GMTK (at least 0.1 f6e7c01e2b27 (ticket161)) for increased speed
* segway: covariances have TEMPORARILY been untied until they are supported again in the new GMTK
* segway: MC/MX/REAL_MAT direct parameters are no longer trained (MEAN/COVAR/DENSECPT parameters are)
* test: update for new GMTK
message.html:
• now requires a new version of GMTK (at least 0.1 f6e7c01e2b27 (ticket161)) for increased speed
  • segway: covariances have TEMPORARILY been untied until they are supported again in the new GMTK
  • segway: MC/MX/REAL_MAT direct parameters are no longer trained (MEAN/COVAR/DENSECPT parameters are)
  • test: update for new GMTK
